techmeme.title: Google cuts the Maps API pricing for Indian devs by ~70% and starts accepting payments in Indian rupee, after Ola unveiled one-year free dev access to Ola Maps (Shashank Pathak/Entrackr)
Messari CEO Ryan Selkis says he ran "too hot" with X posts this week calling for war and sending immigrants back, after Messari leadership told him to cool it (Nick Baker/CoinDesk)
Montréal-based Planned, which offers corporate events and travel planning tools, raised a CAD$35M Series B led by Drive Capital (Bianca Bharti/BetaKit)
Brazil-based Matera, which provides instant payment and QR code payment software to financial institutions, raised $100M from Warburg Pincus to expand in the US (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Xbox says an outage is affecting the Xbox Store and subscriptions, and it is investigating the cause; the outage has been going on since at least 6:57PM ET (Jay Peters/The Verge)
